com.software.reuze

Interface gb_i_SurfaceFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    gb_SuperEllipsoid, gb_SurfaceFunctionSphere

    public interface gb_i_SurfaceFunction
    This interface defines a functor for evaluating the coordinates of a surface mesh used by gb_SurfaceMeshBuilder. It is assumed the implementation creates vertices within the unit sphere (normalized).
